amendment.description: Page 170, after line 12, insert the following: (e) Extending Length of Flights From Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport- Section 41718 ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 112-46 to allow airlines currently operating out of DCA to convert flights to and from large hub airports located within the DCA perimeter to any airport outside of the DCA perimeter.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Schweikert amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Schweikert.
